CustomField.description: Field located in Gmail Integration for Opp Creation. Lead Producers enter 2nd Option Start Dates here. Integrates w Shoot Holds Calendar. Warnings for conflicting Holds in calendar to reduce margin of error.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field located in Gmail Integration for Opp Creation. Lead Producers enter 2nd Option Start Dates here. Integrates w Shoot Holds Calendar. Warnings for conflicting Holds in calendar to reduce margin of error.
CustomField.label: Shoot Date - 2nd - Start
